scenes.description: Ending section of a performance, Mori Calliope hypes up the crowd.
Performance of the song 'Future Island (Skeleton Factory)'.
Performance of the song 'Yona Yona Journey'.

subtitles.original: Up and down zura-zuran-zuran-zura...
subtitles.english: Up and down zura-zuran-zuran-zura...

subtitles.original: Come on everybody! Jump! Jump! Jump!
subtitles.english: Come on everybody! Jump! Jump! Jump!

subtitles.original: 危険な海に浮かぶ島　エッグヘッド
subtitles.english: Island floating in a perilous sea, Egghead

subtitles.original: 世界変える未来自慢のラボ
subtitles.english: A future-boasting lab that will change the world

subtitles.original: 天才個性の願い叶えるよ願望
subtitles.english: Fulfilling the wishes and desires of a genius personality

subtitles.original: 未来のお宝探しちゃおう
subtitles.english: Let's go looking for future treasures

subtitles.original: 何が引き起こす　発想の奇跡
subtitles.english: What will it trigger? A miracle of ideas

subtitles.original: 今で終わらせない夢のファンタジー
subtitles.english: A dream fantasy that won't end now

subtitles.original: 常識ひっくり返るテクノロジー
subtitles.english: Technology that turns common sense upside down

subtitles.original: 叶えちゃうラボラトリー
subtitles.english: A laboratory that makes it happen

subtitles.original: 釈迦でエディソン　ピタゴラス
subtitles.english: Shaka and Edison, Pythagoras

subtitles.original: アトラス　欲（ヨーク）　悪（リリス）のサテライト
subtitles.english: Atlas, York, and Lilith's satellites

subtitles.original: 湧き出すアイデア　止まらない
subtitles.english: The gushing ideas won't stop

subtitles.original: 忙しすぎて猫の手も借りたい
subtitles.english: So busy I'd even take a cat's help

subtitles.original: 海も波も越えていく海賊王
subtitles.english: The Pirate King who crosses both seas and waves

subtitles.original: 常識変えていく発明王
subtitles.english: The King of Invention who changes common sense

subtitles.original: そんな奴らに憧れてきた
subtitles.english: I've always admired those guys

subtitles.original: 次は誰が王になる？
subtitles.english: Who will be the next king?

subtitles.original: 無限のヒューマ　未来のチア
subtitles.english: Infinite Human, Future Cheer

subtitles.original: ひらめきを巻き起こせ
subtitles.english: Trigger an inspiration

subtitles.english: Infinite Human, Future Cheer

subtitles.original: 過去も世界も飛び越して　Singing!
subtitles.english: Leaping over the past and the world, Singing!

subtitles.english: Step up! Let's create a 'by-dea'

subtitles.english: Step up! Zuran zuran zuran zuran

subtitles.english: Step up! The revolution starts here

subtitles.original: Step up! Woo!
subtitles.english: Step up! Woo!

subtitles.english: Island floating in a perilous sea, Egghead

subtitles.english: A future-boasting lab that will change the world

subtitles.original: This is my design undefeated until my goals completed
subtitles.english: This is my design undefeated until my goals completed

subtitles.original: Let's keep on searching for the treasure of to come
subtitles.english: Let's keep on searching for the treasure of to come

subtitles.original: Mysterious! A miracle idea gotta set it free
subtitles.english: Mysterious! A miracle idea gotta set it free

subtitles.original: Furious! Fantastic dreams are burning up inside of me
subtitles.english: Furious! Fantastic dreams are burning up inside of me

subtitles.original: Delirious! Let's turn the world around with new technology
subtitles.english: Delirious! Let's turn the world around with new technology

subtitles.original: Hilarious! A laboratory cast upon the sea
subtitles.english: Hilarious! A laboratory cast upon the sea

subtitles.original: Just better evil than the contents of mind
subtitles.english: Just better evil than the contents of mind

subtitles.original: Ride on technology create violent satellite
subtitles.english: Ride on technology create violent satellite

subtitles.original: Ideas can't stop rushing and stop thinking they might
subtitles.english: Ideas can't stop rushing and stop thinking they might

subtitles.original: Could use a hand too I'm busy working into the night
subtitles.english: Could use a hand too I'm busy working into the night

subtitles.original: The Pirate King who braves the ocean while in search of a mission
subtitles.english: The Pirate King who braves the ocean while in search of a mission

subtitles.original: A ruler of invention that can modify or reason
subtitles.english: A ruler of invention that can modify or reason

subtitles.original: Once watched in jealousy now someday it gotta be
subtitles.english: Once watched in jealousy now someday it gotta be

subtitles.original: Next on the throne, I know what I've got to do
subtitles.english: Next on the throne, I know what I've got to do

subtitles.english: Leaping over the past and the world, Singing!

subtitles.english: Step up! Let's create a 'by-dea'

subtitles.original: Hollywood!
subtitles.english: Hollywood!

subtitles.original: All Dead Beats here tonight and around the world...
subtitles.english: All Dead Beats here tonight and around the world...

subtitles.original: ...raise your hands up to the sky!
subtitles.english: ...raise your hands up to the sky!

subtitles.original: Here we go!
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: 行こうぜ　聞かなきゃ　振りかざす正義
subtitles.english: Let's go, gotta listen, brandishing justice

subtitles.original: 世界も揺るぐ軍団の対峙
subtitles.english: A confrontation of armies that shakes the world

subtitles.original: 潜む巡る怪しいたくらみ
subtitles.english: Mysterious plots lurking and revolving

subtitles.original: 過去の記憶に隠された狂気
subtitles.english: Madness hidden within memories of the past

subtitles.original: 新秩序　起き抜けの勇気
subtitles.english: A new order, the courage upon waking

subtitles.original: 謎に満ちたりその夢のエネルギー
subtitles.english: Full of mystery, the energy of those dreams

subtitles.original: 天才が見せる世界の形
subtitles.english: The shape of the world shown by a genius

subtitles.original: どこへ向かう未来のエッグヘッド
subtitles.english: Where are you headed, future Egghead?

subtitles.original: Hey! Tired of fantasizing wanna run away
subtitles.english: Hey! Tired of fantasizing wanna run away

subtitles.original: Cause I got the place where it's out of space to rise and shine today
subtitles.english: Cause I got the place where it's out of space to rise and shine today

subtitles.original: Last chance to realize and time is short don't be afraid
subtitles.english: Last chance to realize and time is short don't be afraid

subtitles.original: So look up okay
subtitles.english: So look up okay

subtitles.original: Join the rhythm flow, don't be afraid of the stellar beat
subtitles.english: Join the rhythm flow, don't be afraid of the stellar beat

subtitles.original: Kono kebancho de evil cast a spell on streets
subtitles.english: With this kebancho, evil cast a spell on streets

subtitles.original: Yeah, it's just like magic
subtitles.english: Yeah, it's just like magic

subtitles.original: Welcome to Yona Yona Journey, Wake up we're gonna party
subtitles.english: Welcome to Yona Yona Journey, Wake up we're gonna party

subtitles.original: ワタワタはStaging　音でハジけなStage shift
subtitles.english: Flustered staging, pop with the sound, Stage shift

subtitles.original: 体はまだ元気　酸欠で頭はCrazy Crazy Crazy
subtitles.english: Body's still fine, head's crazy from lack of oxygen

subtitles.original: 簡単さ　タクタク旋律　勘違い　頭はStaging
subtitles.english: It's easy, a rhythm, a misunderstanding, head is staging

subtitles.original: まだまだまだ元気　三寒四温　ガナれStage shift
subtitles.english: Still energetic, ups and downs, roar out Stage shift

subtitles.original: 鮮やかなStaging　賛成で朝までCrazy Crazy Crazy
subtitles.english: Vivid staging, in favor of being crazy until morning

subtitles.original: Alright everybody! Come on, all together now! Come on! Clap!
subtitles.english: Alright everybody! Come on, all together now! Come on! Clap!
